title: Optimizing Instructional Design Through Integration of the ADDIE Model and Q10 Platform

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Requires flexible instructional design strategies enabling self-directed learning in smartphone-centric limited technological environments

learning_goals: Utilize the five stages of the ADDIE model (Analysis, Design, Development, Implementation, Evaluation) in conjunction with Q10 platform tools
Design personalized educational content on the Q10 platform based on learner analysis data
Develop multimedia materials optimized for smartphone environments and integrate them into an LMS
Operate a process that provides immediate feedback on the Q10 platform by analyzing formative assessment results

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
